content.text:
Here is the output, wrapped in the specified tags:

Customer Service Representative Responsibilities

1. Provide product and service information - Answer customer questions about products, services, pricing, features, and options - Explain product benefits and how services work - Offer recommendations based on customer needs 2. Process orders and transactions - Take customer orders by phone or in person - Enter order details into the system accurately - Process payments and complete transactions - Inform customers about shipping options and timeframes 3. Handle account changes and cancellations - Assist customers with making changes to their accounts - Process upgrade, downgrade, or cancellation requests - Explain relevant account policies and procedures 4. Resolve customer complaints - Listen attentively to customer complaints and concerns - Apologize sincerely for any issues and take ownership - Investigate and troubleshoot problems to determine solutions - Offer remedies to resolve complaints satisfactorily - Escalate complex issues to a supervisor or manager as needed 5. Document customer interactions - Take detailed notes on customer inquiries, orders, changes and complaints - Update customer account records in the CRM system - Summarize issues and solutions for tracking purposes
